  def make_subdir(cls, dep = false)
    # get sub directory
    glob = "#{@path}/#{cls.glob}*"
    sub = Dir.uglob(glob)
    if !sub
      puts "#{self.class}: no subdirectory matching #{glob} found"
      return true
    end

    # create sub make object
    sub_options = @options
    sub_options[:path] = sub
    sub_options[:dependency] = dep if dep
    smake = cls.new(sub_options)
    smake.submit
  end
